## Install _simPM_

Currently `simPM` is hosted on GitHub. The lastest version of `simPM` can be installed using the code provided below. 

```r
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
intall_github("YiFengEDMS/simPM")
``` 


## R source code 

The source code of this R package is made public on the first author's [Github](https://github.com/YiFengEDMS/simPM).
